tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE training_configs (
	config_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	hyperparameter_id INT,
	learning_rate FLOAT,
	epochs INT,
	batch_size INT
	FOREIGN KEY (hyperparameter_id) REFERENCES hyperparameters(hyperparameter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE configuration (
    config_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_id UUID REFERENCES hyperparameters(experiment_id),
    model_type VARCHAR,
    optimizer VARCHAR,
    loss_function VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE metrics (
    metric_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_id UUID REFERENCES hyperparameters(experiment_id),
    accuracy FLOAT,
    precision FLOAT,
    recall FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE training_configurations (
	config_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	config_name STRING,
	hparams_id UUID REFERENCES hyperparameters(hyperparam_id),
	epoch_count INT,
	learning_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE experiments (
	exp_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	exp_name STRING,
	config_id UUID REFERENCES training_configurations(config_id),
	start_time TIMESTAMP,
	end_time TIMESTAMP
);
